p:
There are several types of propolis with different compositions depending on the region, climate, and extraction season
26, 27 . More than 300 substances have already been identified in different samples of propolis
28 . Some of the propolis types have been used to produce gold nanoparticles since this natural product presents a high amount of polyphenolic acids, flavonoids, terpenoids, and other molecules that can reduce Au +3 to Au 0
29â€“ 31 .
